headline: Pascal Desroches to Update Shareholders at the 2025 Mizuho Technology Conference on June 10
summary: Tomorrow, AT&T's chief financial officer will participate in a fireside chat where he will discuss the Company's multi-year strategic growth plan.

headline: Warner Bros. Discovery’s split is the latest twist in media's never-ending merger and spin-off saga
summary: Over the past two decades, media giants have repeatedly turned to corporate breakups and restructurings as a strategic response to changing business models and mounting pressure from investors.

raw.headline: Warner Bros. Discovery’s split is the latest twist in media's never-ending merger and spin-off saga
raw.summary: Over the past two decades, media giants have repeatedly turned to corporate breakups and restructurings as a strategic response to changing business models and mounting pressure from investors.

headline: From Time Inc to Discovery: Warner Bros breakup puts spotlight on checkered M&A history
summary: Time Warner merges with AOL, forming AOL Time Warner, the largest merger in history at the time, aiming to merge traditional and digital media. AOL Time Warner merger begins to unravel as AOL's value collapses with the launch of an SEC investigation, prompted by allegations of accounting irregularities and inflated revenue reports at AOL. CEO Steve Case resigns from AOL Time Warner.

raw.headline: From Time Inc to Discovery: Warner Bros breakup puts spotlight on checkered M&A history

CEO Steve Case resigns from AOL Time Warner.

headline: WBD split: What will Warner Bros. Discovery look like as two separate companies?
summary: Three years after WarnerMedia joined Discovery Inc., the media conglomerate created from that merger says it needs to be nimbler to compete.
